|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-SG1008D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v4.21 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/06/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-SG1008D_v4.21 |series = TL-SG1008D |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- OUI -->
|sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8368S; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |sw_class = unmanaged
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 1GbE 4-port PHY;Realtek;RTL8214;;1; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2009 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B001EVGIYG |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== [http://www.geekatwork.de/2010/02/02/switch-hacking/ Info @ '''geekatwork.de'''] (w/ excellent internal shots [heatsinks removed]) :"8-port Gigabit Desktop Switch (RTL)(A)", "REV: 1.1", and a date code of '''0942''' is silkscreened on the board shown.
v5 models [http://debugmo.de/2010/01/whats-inside-part-3-tp-link-tl-sf1008d/ may be using BCM5398]
